sentences.sContent: That roof is dangerous, do get off.
sentences.sCn: 那房顶太危险，千万要下来。

sentences.sContent: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
sentences.sCn: 劳驾，我必须在下一站下车。

sentences.sContent: Democracy would take us where we wanted to go, not our own effort.Sometimes you have to get off and push.
sentences.sCn: 民主会把我们带到我们想去的地方，但光靠我们的努力还不行，有时候要下车推一推。

synos.tran: 动身；免于受罚；从…下来；脱下（衣服等）
